messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] magic
messages.msgSnippet: ... When the kid was 3ish, he was outside playing with the neighbor s dog. My sister and I were talking to eachother when he came in and said.. Aunt Kim,
messages.messageBody:
>That's what I didn't want to do with her - make magic seem impossible!
>Cindy Ferguson

When the kid was 3ish, he was outside playing with the neighbor's dog.

My sister and I were talking to eachother when he came in and said..
'Aunt Kim, Thumper wants to know when the man who watches him will be
back.'

I didn't take any stock in it, but my sister said 'The neighbor was away
for the past 3 days'.

My son had NO prior knowlege of that (since we were visiting) and we
consider that a magic ability.


We also try to visualize parking spaces close to where we're going on
cold or messy days. And the magic invariably always works!

*smile*

best regards to Megan's magic hunt. Have faith she'll find it!

regards,
kolleen
